---
title: "Custom Report"
output:
  html_document: default
params:
  custom_plot: "none"
  append_custom: true
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r echo=FALSE}
purrr::walk(params$custom_plot$plot, function(plot){
  print(plot)
  cat("\n")
})

```
```{r echo=FALSE}
if(params$append_custom)
print(params$append_custom)
```
